OOC:( Code, I was refering to JP.  And JP appologized. Oh and for 
reading posts, did you write this one?

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > > OCC: Yeah, Dark Mouse is a slut all right. Who loved Silverbolt
> > again?...

For the record, you sent that one Code.  But I"m not worried about 
it. It's only a character. This has nothing to do with real life.  So 
let's not focus on this and let's get back to RPGing. *smiles* All is 
forgiven and forgotten all around. Besides, DarkMouse isn't the one 
who is programmed to be a slut anyway. *LMAO*  So who cares. I don't.
Have fun and see you on PAST EARTH.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Logo Morph, I never called Dark Mouse a slut, JP did, I just 
pointed out

loved

jumping to
> conclusions!...

my
> > > > boyfriend. He's my commander. I am programmed to follow him. 
Got
> > a
> > > > problem with it?" she knew she should have held her tongue, 
but
> > she
> > > > wanted this bot to know that she was following orders and
> > > > programming, not just her spark.
> > > > "I'll stay here, but I still wish to see my commander."
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> > > > >     Black Aracnia led Darkmouse deep into the innards of
> > Trypticon.
> > > > As foar
> > > > > as she was concerned, she was the commander now. She single
> > > > handedly saved
> > > > > the ship, and the dominance of the Predacons as well.
> > > > >     "Alright you parasitic slut, you'lll be caged here 
until I
> > talk
> > > > with
> > > > > Megatron. Your boyfriend is eight levels up, and the 
internal
> > > > weponry is
> > > > > still armed and ready so I suggest you stay put." Aracnia 
said,
> > > > motioning
> > > > > with her gun for Darkmouse to enter the vault where energon 
was
> > > > formerly kept.
> > > > >
> > > > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > > >
> > > > >     The mirk of the swapms was the thickest in all the beast
> > wars.
> > > > No other
> > > > > place was as dismal or dark as the swamps that bordered the
> > > > Predacon and
> > > > > Maximal territories. They were vast, deep, and housed some 
of
> > the
> > > > most
> > > > > dangerous prehistoric creatures anyone had seen.
> > > > >     Among all the chaos of the bugs and aquatic life of the
> > swamp,
> > > > a long
> > > > > lost and forgotten stasis pod slipped from its peach and
> > floated to
> > > > the bank
> > > > > of a body of water.
> > > > >     The computer, now able to activate, began the DNA 
scanning
> > > > process to
> > > > > select the beast mode of the protoform within. The sphere 
rose,
> > and
> > > > scanned
> > > > > the vast area of the swamp. After a double pass, it selected
> > the
> > > > most
> > > > > powerful beast mode according to the habitat.
> > > > >     The sphere rejoined the pod, and the transformation 
began.
> > > > Moments past
> > > > > and the computer bagan to read off the data needed by the 
new
> > form
> > > > to survive
> > > > > in the beast wars.
> > > > >     With a crack, the door opened and the new warrior 
crawled
> > out
> > > > of the pod
> > > > > and on to the bank of the swamp. He looked around. With the
> > > > complete history
> > > > > of the beast wars stored in his data banks, he would be 
able to
> > > > handle
> > > > > himself in this new world.
> > > > >     Looking, he said to himself, "Ah, this beast mode shall
> > make a
> > > > fine body.
> > > > > Now all I need to do is to transform."
> > > > >     Paralysis said the code word and his Predacon Beast Mode
> > > > emerged. The
> > > > > frog changed into an armored knight of the Predacon 
dynasty. He
> > was
> > > > armed
> > > > > with a toxen gun, a semi-automatic pistol, and optic lasers.
> > > > >     "Ha! Now to contact the Predacons...and to end the 
reign of
> > the
> > > > Maximals!"
